Articles.Content:
I've searched the forums but there doesn't seem to be an obvious answer for this. Is there a known means (with a mod, or by placing music files in a certain folder/place, or whatever) of replacing or expanding the default KSP soundtrack?

I'm thinking the soundtrack to the original Cosmos TV series (the old one, with Carl Sagan) would be awesomely appropriate. Yes, I know, I can disable in-game music and run iTunes in the background or whatever, but Jeb ought to be able to crank his own tunes, right?

Edited August 21, 2014 by eataTREE
